 053:     Return the value of the partition function :math:`Q(T)` at a given

 055:     using functions `energy` and `degeneracy` that accept as argument a quantum

This algorithm is\n    suitable for unevenly-spaced energy levels in the array of energy grains\n    `Elist` (in J/mol), but assumes the solution of the Schrodinger equation\n    gives evenly-spaced energy levels with spacing `energy` in kJ/mol and\n    degeneracy `degeneracy`.\n    ";
